snippet: The group, which a spokesman says is made up of former government workers and political operatives, is, at low cost, challenging Bill de Blasio’s character.
abstract: Trailside blog; online video attacking Bill de Blasio, produced by group known only as Citizen Truth, has grown in popularity; attack ad alleges that de Blasio used government staff to care for his children during during his time as New York City councilman, charge which he denies; Web attack ads are becoming increasingly common, and because they are low-budget allow producers to remain anonymous under campaign spending laws.
lead_paragraph: The group, which a spokesman says is made up of former government workers and political operatives, is, at low cost, challenging Bill de Blasio’s character.

headline.main: Veiled Group Shows Ease of Using Web for Attack Ads
headline.print_headline:
Veiled Group Shows Ease
Of Using Web for Attacks
